verbs.description: A number of Republican governors [V: have] backed President Donald Trump ’s nomination for the 2018 Nobel Peace Prize following his efforts to unite North Korea and South Korea .

[ARG0: A number of Republican governors] have [V: backed] [ARG1: President Donald Trump ’s nomination for the 2018 Nobel Peace Prize] [ARGM-TMP: following his efforts to unite North Korea and South Korea] .
A number of Republican governors have backed President Donald Trump ’s nomination for the 2018 Nobel Peace Prize [V: following] [ARG2: his efforts to unite North Korea and South Korea] .
A number of Republican governors have backed President Donald Trump ’s nomination for the 2018 Nobel Peace Prize following his efforts to [V: unite] [ARG1: North Korea and South Korea] .
